member.name: M:Extenso.Web.OData.GenericODataController`2.SetNewId(`0)

member.name: M:Extenso.Web.OData.GenericODataController`2.ApplyMandatoryFilter(System.Linq.IQueryable{`0})
member.summary: Add any filters which must be applied for the client. Mostly used for fields such as "TenantId", where you don't want the user viewing data for a different site (tenant)
